members.name: CompositionEvent()
members.description: Creates a new CompositionEvent object instance.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: A DOMString representing the characters entered by an input method.

members.name: CompositionEvent.data
members.description: Returns the characters generated by the input method that raised the event; its varies depending on the type of event that generated the CompositionEvent object.

members.name: CompositionEvent.locale
members.description: Returns the locale of current input method (for example, the keyboard layout locale if the composition is associated with IME).

members.name: CompositionEvent.initCompositionEvent()
members.description: Initializes the attributes of a CompositionEvent object.

parameters.name: typeArg
parameters.description: A DOMString representing the type of composition event; this will be one of compositionstart, compositionupdate, or compositionend.

parameters.name: canBubbleArg
parameters.description: A Boolean specifying whether or not the event can bubble.

parameters.name: cancelableArg
parameters.description: A Boolean shether or not the event can be canceled.

parameters.name: viewArg
parameters.description: The Window object from which the event was generated.

parameters.name: dataArg
parameters.description: A DOMString representing the value of the data attribute.

parameters.name: localeArg
parameters.description: A DOMString representing the value of the locale attribute.
